thread.title: Weather: STORM DORIS is on the way
thread.title_full: Weather: STORM DORIS is on the way | Border - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Weather: STORM DORIS is on the way
text:
A deep area of low pressure is moving in later this week and will bring stormy weather to the UK.
Warnings are in place for very strong winds on THURSDAY and the risk of snow over higher ground.
It has become the fourth named storm of the season - Storm Doris.
Stormy weather on the wat Credit: Met Office People in the 'amber area' are being told to 'Be Prepared' for damaging winds.
Snow could cause problems over higher routes.
Several warnings are in place. You can keep up with the updates here .
Weather warnings Last updated Tue 21 Feb 2017 Weather Storm Doris Cumbria Scotland Dumfries and Galloway Scottish Borders
